1.content:
Creeping down a darkened hallway, the hired thief kept a watchful eye for any security cameras. It was 2am at Parker-Gibson Drug Company.
Having memorized the layout of the building, he walked briskly and carefully. Most of the security devices had been deactivated earlier by a virus he had uploaded into the main security system, and according to his information the only security guard was at the opposite end of the building. He had about 10 minutes to break into the specific room, overcome the combination lock in a safe, and find a large canister of Formula X200-A.

This particular job had begun two weeks ago when a disguised voice called on his unlisted number, promising him $500,000 if he could sneak into Parker-Gibson and steal an experimental drug formula. Who this potential client was or the purpose of this formula was left undisclosed, but the person promised $200,000 upfront if he could deliver in less than two weeks. After the wiring of the money, he began planning the job. The main Parker-Gibson building had formidable security, but nothing up to some of his previous work. He was confident he could pull it off.
The thief also did some research on the company's upcoming drugs. Nothing he could find about the company's current research raised any red flags, certainly none that warranted this level of industrial espionage and theft. Whatever this secret formula was, the company was keeping it extremely confidential.
Reaching the correct room, he quickly picked the lock and slipped inside. The blackened room was full of steel cabinets fitted with embedded combination locks.
For this obstacle he was in luck, as his employer had somehow supplied the correct combination. Locating cabinet E5, he inputted the correct combination, and with a swift but silent pull, opened the door. Inside he found two large canisters, circular and about a foot in height. One was labeled X200-A, but the other was labeled X-200G. Though he was only being paid to steal the 'A' canister, he figured why not grab both and maybe later double his pay. Slipping both canisters into his backpack, he relocked the cabinet and after eluding security, made his escape.
But who will he deliver the formula to?

11.content:
Angela handled the canister in her hands carefully. Yesterday she had paid half a million dollars electronically to the man she had hired to ‘procure’ it for her. Having gone to so much trouble and money to obtain it, she pondered the best way to accomplish her goals.

For the past few years Angela had been thinking of a way to make her daughter Stephanie truly exceptional. She had watched her grow up into a pretty, but in nearly all measures average young girl. Having just celebrated her 16th birthday, she was undersized (5 feet even) and maintained a steady B average in school. Slight, with poor posture, she had never developed any inclination towards sports, and though Angela loved her also deeply wanted much more for her daughter. After her husband’s death when she was 11 Angela had taken Stephanie out of public school and began teaching her through private tutors. In nearly all ways her daughter was a happy, adjusted teenager, but Angela wanted more.

Angela was a woman who in many ways was obsessed with strength. Her husband had been both a physically and mentally strong individual, one whose life was cut short by a tragic plane accident five years ago. He had left her a vast fortune from his entertainment and media empire, and she had invested a fair amount of her money in female athletes and bodybuilders, secretly sponsoring several of the more recent champions. Not athletic herself and in her late 40’s, she had long desired to somehow transform Stephanie into a stronger, physically exceptional specimen of the female gender. And now she had the means to do so.

A few months ago one of her associates had informed her of a breakthrough product in a local pharmaceutical company, Parker-Gibson. Over a few martinis, this friend had joked that the company had perfected a growth accelerator for the human body. He went on to describe the early tests on animals, and the fact that one liter of the final powdery formula had taken months to synthesize. After making some further inquiries into the exact location and security surrounding the formula, she had made her move.

Now she had the means to make her daughter into one of the most unique people on the planet. But how exactly would she do it?

111.content:
Stephanie stared at the large weights all over the gym her mother had set up. She cringed at the idea of lifting any of them, much less the large ones already set on several stations. She turned her head toward her mother and the large men, Jeff and Bill, standing next to her.

“Well I understand you wanting me to be in good shape and all, but there is no way I can lift most of these weights. Did you set this up for those two?”

Angela smiled as she handed her daughter the bottle that had the formula mixed in. Angela was looking for quick results, so the concentration was high. With her other connections, Angela had also added other muscle building proteins to the drink, unknowingly amplifying the effects.

“No, this is all for you. Just look at this as your goal. Now make sure you drink your sports drink, it’s new.”

Stephanie sighed as she took the drink and with her mother staring on, took a long drink. Stephanie crinkled her nose. The drink tasted good. Not thinking, she took another long drink, smacking her lips. She blinked her eyes as a tingling sensation permeated her body.

“Uh, what exactly is in this drink? I feel kind of weird.”

Her mom looked her over. Stephanie didn’t look any different. “Just special vitamins and minerals.”

Stephanie shrugged her shoulders as her mom smiled. “Well I’ll leave you with your trainers. I’ve got a meeting to get to.”

Stephanie smiled weakly and turned to look at the two large men. Each man was 6 foot 2 and had to weigh 250 pounds of solid muscle. Why on earth did her mom think she needed one man that big, much less two to work with her. It was bad enough that she felt puny normally at only 5 foot tall and 90 pounds. Tugging on her pink designer work out shirt she shuffled forward, her matching pink shorts ruffled half way down her thin thighs. The pink work out shoes padded forward and a hard breath did nothing to push her bone thin chest forward. The men kept straight faces as they guided her to a machine used to work her chest.

She sat down and with some quick guidance and a booster seat brought her arms around to the side of the machine. “So what does this do?”

Jeff stood in front of her, ready to help pull the bars to the center. “This works you chest muscles. Don’t worry, we’ll start with the smallest weight, 20 pounds.”

Once Bill set the peg, he nodded to Todd, who looked at the nervous Stephanie. “OK, now try and pull your arms together.”

Taking a deep breath, Stephanie did just that and with some effort and a little guidance from Jeff, pulled the weight forward until the bars met in the middle. He smiled at her. “Now let the bars back, but slowly.”

Stephanie complied and with a small grunt from the effort and a light clang of the weights had her arms back at the starting point. Jeff nodded his head. “OK. 11 more just like that.”

Stephanie’s eyes widened. “Eleven?”

Jeff snickered. “You can do it. Now we’ll just work one at a time.”

As Stephanie sighed, she felt an odd sensation. The tingling she felt from the drink returned and with it a feeling of energy. Shaking her head, she looked ahead and pulled the weight forward again, and this time it felt easier! Before Jeff could even reach out, Stephanie was pulling the weight back and with little hesitation, started a third rep. Jeff’s eyebrows raised slightly as Stephanie cranked out the reps like a pro and in no time finished her set of 12. Smiling, Stephanie looked at the somewhat surprised Jeff.

“Well that was easy! Maybe I’m stronger than you thought!”

Jeff tilted his head in agreement. “I guess so. If 20 pounds was too easy, let’s raise the weight up.”

Bill reached down and moved the peg to 40 pounds. Jeff looked at Stephanie and nodded his head. Stephanie did the same and pulled at the weight, feeling the added resistance. But to everyone’s continued surprise, she showed no additional strain and after reaching the middle and bringing it back down she held her arms.

“Still felt kind of light.”

Jeff looked over at Bill. “You heard the girl. Let’s try 60 pounds. Although that is pretty heavy considering you barely weight 90 pounds.”

As Bill complied, Stephanie puffed a strand of hair from her face. “Yeah. But whatever mom put in that drink seems to be working. I’m feeling pretty energetic. And strong too.”

As Stephanie brought the bars forward the serum was truly working on her body, building up muscle quickly against the stress at a previously impossible rate. The once bone thin chest had already added a few pounds of muscle across her pectorals and was poised to add more. So when Stephanie pulled the weight back, her muscles had already compensated and were already capable of lifting more. Stephanie looked at Jeff and in a barely contained excited voice asked for more.

Bill looked at the weights to make sure there wasn’t an issue, but complied, bringing the peg down to 80 pounds. Stephanie repeated the pull and this time seemed to struggle a bit. Jeff nodded his head and resumed his position to see how many reps she could do. But even as she started her second rep her muscles built up from her forearms, across her biceps and triceps, down her shoulders and across her chest. With a solid inch of pectoral muscle blazing across her chest, Stephanie felt the resistance melt away and after the third rep stopped. Feeling like she were in some kind of weird zone and now wanting to truly tax her body, Stephanie grunted with a bit of annoyance.

“Still too easy. I need more weight!”

Jeff stood back up. “Are you sure?”

Stephanie looked at him through narrow, almost angry eyes. “Of course I’m sure! Now either add some real weight or I’ll do it myself!”

Jeff nodded to Bill who figured to put this silly contest to an end. This girl must have worked out before he figured. So instead of putting it to 100 pounds, Bill moved the peg to 160 pounds, figuring that would shut the little girl up.

And it looked like it would once Stephanie began to pull and could only move the bars a few inches before dropping it back. Jeff tried not to smile and as Stephanie grimaced, he waited for her to fail before asking Bill to drop the weight back down. But the first lift only caused Stephanie’s body to work faster, building up muscles at an accelerated rate. And not just any muscle, but dense, stronger than normal muscle. Muscles ripped and repaired grew to over twice the density of the originals, effectively more than doubling her strength each time her body was stressed. So when Stephanie pulled her arms together for the second time, the bars sailed to the center with a loud clang, easily raising the 160 pounds as her chest pushed out three inches thick, pulling her athletic top taught as her back had also widened. Another quick rep caused Stephanie to pause.

“More. That second rep felt easy.”

By now Jeff was stunned. And he now noticed that this once bone thin girl was sporting muscles that weren’t there moments before. But he was warned about this from Angela, although he didn’t believe her. So he looked at Bill and shrugged his shoulders. Bill gave him a look of equal surprise, but reached down and pulled the pin down again, this to the bottom and 300 pounds.

And as Stephanie took another breath she started to tug on the bars. And this time…

Her body nearly erupted with muscle, adding inches across her entire frame, from her calves to her thighs, to her abs, to her back and to her arms, but especially her chest. It was as if her body were a living nuclear power plant, supplying an unlimited supply of muscle and strength on command! There was little pause as Stephanie grunted and tugged against the weight, slowly and steadily bringing her arms together! Her top now groaned and ripped as her chest slammed forth five inches of pure pectoral power! By the time the bars reached she already was several times stronger and once she pulled the bars back, the stress of the weight was already melting away. A second rep saw the bars sail forward, slamming the bars together and hitting the stop harshly at the back of the machine. Stephanie growled.

“I said more! I want to get a work out!”

Jeff stammered. “That’s the top weight for this machine! You’re lifting 300 pounds!”

That fact should have surprised Stephanie, but she was hardly satisfied and dropped the weights back with a hard clang. “Then we need to find something else!”

Stephanie hopped off the machine and feeling the tingling still permeating her chest, flexed down, pushing her pectorals and muscle filled breasts forward, pushing the once form fitting top forward, exposing her deep muscle cleavage and straining the material. Her arms now looked like they belonged to a high end fitness girl and even her legs look impressive. Her abs were a solid six pack of muscle. What none of them knew however was these muscles were denser than any human ever had before. Denser than any being on earth. She was already as strong as Jeff or Bill and she had only been lifting for a few minutes!

With his eyes wide, Jeff pointed to the bench press machine. The one he thought was just for show, since there was no way this girl would ever be able to lift the weights already set on them. Hell, he couldn’t lift them. The bar held 2000 pounds and looked almost ridiculous. Stephanie smiled and quickly marched over to the bench and looked at Bill for some guidance.

“Uh, just lay down under the bar. We’ll spot you. You reach up and bring the weight down to your chest and then try and push it up. But this is over 2000 pounds. Nobody on earth has ever benched this.”

Stephanie ignored his extra comments and sniffed. “Sounds easy enough.”

Jeff and Bill moved to either side as Stephanie took her position, her feet dangling above the ground. Reaching up, Stephanie gripped the bar and with the help of the two large men pulled the bar off the rack. And as they slowly let go, Stephanie let out a pained grunt as her arms shook. But the pain and shaking were short lived as her muscles responded once again, building quickly in both size and strength. Her arms piled on muscles, popping and pressing outward from her forearms down her biceps and triceps. Her shoulders bunched and built up bigger. And her chest plowed forward, giving her the strength to hold the weight and the muscle to move it down. Inches of pectorals surged forward, stretching the material further and popping threads along both sides. By the time the bar was touching her chest her pectorals had risen another three inches and looked like twin volleyball sized monitors, thick and angular. Resting the bar on her chest caused Stephanie to wince and the bar dug into her muscles, pressing then down. But even this was soon compensated for as her body fueled her muscles with denser and stronger muscles! The bar soon moved upward by the power of her pectorals alone! Stephanie let out a pleasurable moan and releasing her grip, simply balanced the weight across pectorals now harder than steel and able to withstand over one ton of weight on a one inch thick bar! The top gave up the ghost and ripped completely along both sides, held against her sweat soaked skin by the bar resting on her twelve inch thick pectorals! With a happy sigh, Stephanie powered the bar back up, laughing at how light the weight already felt! As the stunned men reached out to grab the bar, Stephanie pulled it back down and with a light tap against her super powered chest, back up just as quickly. This time reveling in her new strength, Stephanie cranked out 10 reps before pausing.

“Ha! More weight than any man has ever lifted huh? Feels pretty light to me! Guess that makes me the strongest person to ever live then! And I’m just getting started. Why don’t you two press down on the weight and see if you can give me a work out.”

The men could barely comprehend what they were witnessing, but without any thought did just that, causing a slight grunt from Stephanie as she felt the added resistance, but then a quick giggle as she easily pushed the bar, and the men back up to complete her repetition. Before the men could even release their grip and reach the floor, Stephanie sat up, pushing the bar forward and sending the men reeling. They tumbled forward 15 feet along the ground and grunted. Stephanie giggled as she held the bar in front of her and pulled her leg over the side, hopping off the bench and tossing the bar a few inches into the air, and grabbing it above her head to reverse the grip. The ruined top fell to the ground, exposing fully Stephanie’s mega muscled upper body. There wasn’t an inch that wasn’t bulging with super strong, super sized muscles! Her abs were no less than a 10 pack of thick, insanely separated muscles across her narrow midsection. Detailed obliques pulsed up her side and out to a four foot wide back and twin, striated 20 inch thick, two foot wide each set of pectorals. She then brought the bar down to her sprinter thick thighs and smiled as the two men regained their sensed and sat back up.

“Apparently not, huh boys? But no matter. It’s time to try something else anyway. From what I read about earlier today, this is what is called a curl right?”

And with another grunt Stephanie began to pull against the bar, feeling the heavy resistance for a moment as her biceps now bulged to once un-thought of proportions as her strength increased to compensate for the stress, building up well beyond any 10 normal men in an instant! And just like any resistance she had experienced, the stress was soon reduced and her muscles grew even denser as they expanded. Her biceps exploded in size and power to 24 inches around as the bar reached her massive chest. Stephanie brought the weight back down and hissed.

“Still too light! Is there no weight that I can’t just lift once and grow so strong that it feels nearly weightless?”

Cranking out a few more easy lifts, Stephanie pulled her hands together, balanced the bar quickly and released the weight with one hand. She then brought the weight to her side and smiled at the two men staring up this 5 foot tall, 16 year old girl with more muscles now littering her body than any man alive and more strength than any 20 men! With another light grunt, Stephanie fought against the weight for a moment before her muscles once again built up to the challenge, growing denser, more detailed and stronger. With a knowing smile, Stephanie looked at the men and flexed up her other arm even as she began to curl the 2000 plus pound weight with her other arm. Both biceps exploded with she muscle the likes of which had never been flexed before. Like rising mountains, her biceps pushed upward and outward to 28 inches with her first flex and rep and then to 30 inches with her second! She then pulled the weight out at arm’s length and began performing double bicep flexes as though she were holding a broom stick! Each repetition made her stronger! Each flex added two inches of pure girl muscle to her arms!

Now laughing, Stephanie continued to pump her world record breaking biceps, completely enjoying her rise toward true super strength!

“I guess not! But pumping my mighty muscles seems to add enough stress to keep them growing bigger and stronger! How many tons do you think I can curl now?”

Stephanie continued to bring her forearm down and then back up, flexing down at each apex, adding more strength and size to her biceps with each repetition. Her fingers now dug into the bar and the weights began to sag on either end, not that Stephanie noticed, since the one ton was nothing more than air to her now. At 36 inches around, her biceps were near her wrist. At 40 inches around her bicep had pushed her forearm to vertical as not only were her bicep bulging up and over her football sized shoulders and up to the top of her fists, but they were now so wide at the base that they were running out of room to expand anywhere but up! Now biting her lip, Stephanie continued to pump her magnificent muscles. Up and down her forearm traveled, smacking into her growing biceps with every flex! By the time her biceps had reached 50 impossible inches around with the peaks up to the top of her head, Stephanie gave the bar one last squeeze and pinched the steel in half, sending both halves crashing to the ground. Laughing again, Stephanie held her pose for a moment longer.

“So boys, it looks like I’m not just the strongest person on earth, but I’d have to say I’m the most muscular too!”

Releasing her flex, Stephanie tossed the small shard of compressed bar to the ground and placed her hands on her hips.

“But that still leaves of with the problem of me getting a work out. Any ideas?”

“Oooooohhh that was so incredible, I still feel high! I’m so much stronger and sexier now I could do anything, but it isn’t enough! And since my host was nice enough to leave more of this strange stuff out, I can have even more!”

“Bottoms up!” she shouted, throwing caution to the wind and hoisting the glass.

“Wha- NOOO!!!!” screeched Angela, reentering the room just in time to see things growing out of control.

“ooooOOHHHH MMMM YES YES YESSS!!” Stacey cried, her body shuddering for a moment before she raced up, her truck-sized tits crashing through the ceiling while they continued to expand over her washboard abs. “THIS FEELS SO GOOD AND I JUST CAN’T STOP GETTING BIGGER AND STRONGER AND SEXIER!!”

“Mom! What’s going on???” yelled Stephanie as she ran into the kitchen, before freezing at the sight of a 30-foot tall and growing goddess.

“No time to explain, run honey!!”

“WHAT, SO FRIGHTENED OF A LITTLE COLLEGE GIRL? I’LL BE COMING FOR MORE FORMULA IN A MINUTE, BUT FIRST IT’S TIME TO GROOOOOOOWWWWW!!”

Continuing to moan in an increasingly deep and sultry tone, the bodybuilder decimated the mansion. At last she topped off at 50 feet, her long blond hair rippling over her traps and down a knotted back. She was the pinnacle of strength and just wanted more! The formula and its stronger counterpart were both still in the house, meaning there was about to be easy access to growth for...
11223.title: Supersized Stacey!

Stephanie isn't sure.
113.content:
Angela stared at the canister sitting on her desk. She had not changed her mind as to wanting to use the formula on Stephanie but began to think. What if the product didn't work? Or what if it didn’t do exactly what it promised? It needed to be tested. But where? Then the idea struck her. She rang her chauffeur. Ten minutes later her limo was driving north out the city toward an abandoned, secluded airstrip that her company had acquired in a real estate deal. At the very edge of the strip was huge hangar that old owners used to store their planes during the winter months. Angela had her driver cut the lock off the hangar with a pair of bolt cutters. When she saw the inside, she smiled to herself and then pulled out her cell phone.

"Stephanie darling, I have major deal that I am trying to broker right now. So I'm going to be gone for a few months."

"MONTHS???"

"Yes, right after that I'm flying to the Yucatan Peninsula to oversee production of a new reality show the company is shooting."

"Oh."

"The time will pass quickly I promise. And I will have a huge surprise to show you when I'm through"

"Ok mom. Love you."

"Love you too sweetie. Bye."

Angela closed her phone as the first of the trucks with the weights and medical equipment she ordered rolled through the gates.

EIGHT MONTHS LATER

Stephanie's cell phone rang.

"Mom?!"

"Hello darling. How are you?"

"I'm fine. Are you feeling well mom?"

"I feel fantastic. Why?"

"Well....your voice. It sounds deeper, kinda weird."

Angela laughed.

"Don't worry about my voice. I'm sending the limo to pick you up and bring you to me."

"Ok mom."

Twenty minutes later, the limo arrived at the hangar. Stephanie stepped inside the huge building and was amazed at what she saw. The place was like a self-contained city. To her immediate left was a weight area with possibly every piece of modern gym equipment known to mankind. Next to that was a medical area with diagnostic equipment, beds, the works. Just beyond that was a full laboratory set-up. On the right was the food area. Four long tables with benches and servers were carrying platter after platter after platter and setting them down. Behind cafeteria were apparently the sleeping areas which had rows of beds. At the very back of the hangar, was a walled off area that appeared to be someone’s private quarters/office area.

As Stephanie looked around, a woman who resembled her mom’s personal assistant Kelly came up to her. Except this Kelly was nothing like she remembered! She had to be at least 6 foot 1, and her pleated skirt did nothing to hide the huge, muscular thighs underneath. The high heels she was wearing made her calves bulge and swell until they were nearly bigger than both Stephanie’s legs combined. The old Kelly had small, skinny arms with a very modest C cup bosom. The new Kelly’s 23 ½ inch biceps were stretching the sleeves of her blouse to near bursting as she tried to use her tablet to cover her FF-cup breasts. She bent down to look at Stephanie and three buttons on her blouse popped open. Stephanie jumped back as the woman leaned down and then the realization hit her. All the people in this hangar were ripped beyond belief!! From the doctors and the nurses and the scientists, the cooks, the servers, even down the janitorial staff looked like professional bodybuilders. All the women were built like strippers on steroids and the men had the bodies of Greek gods and were hung like elephants. And judging from that fact that at least 4 of the nurses, one female scientist and one of the servers were pregnant, it was obvious that no one had left this building in quite some time.

“Stephanie? STEPHANIE??”


“Huh? What?”

Kelly smiled down at her.

“Your mom is waiting for you.”

“My mom is here?”

“Of course she is. Follow me.”

Kelly and Stephanie walked toward the secluded area. Stephanie heard a husky, female voice talking to someone on the phone. She stepped in behind Kelly to see her mother sitting behind a huge desk.
“I’ll accept no less than 300 million. You won’t? Then forget it. Deal’s off.”

Angela hung up the phone and smiled at her daughter.

“Steph! It’s so good to see you!”

Angela stood up to hug her daughter. Except that she kept rising well beyond what Stephanie was accustomed to. Angela was now close to 6 feet, 10 inches tall and bigger than any other person in the building. As huge as Kelly’s legs were, Angela’s were double that. Stephanie could literally, lay down on top of one of her mother’s quadriceps with room to spare. Her abs, with showed through the thick blouse she was wearing looked like cement masonry bricks stacked on top of each other. Her breasts looked like two over-inflated basketballs sitting on top of her unabridged dictionary thick pecs. Her shoulders looked like someone had stuffed football helmets underneath her skin. And last but not least were her biceps. Even in their relaxed state they were nearly bigger than Kelly’s leg. And Stephanie could only imagine how big they would get when fully pumped up. Stephanie also noticed that the streak of gray that was in her mother’s hair had completely disappeared. The few wrinkles her face-lift and Botox injections couldn’t get rid of had completely disappeared. In fact, if Stephanie didn’t know any better she’d swear the woman standing before her was in her mid to late twenties! She looked exactly like the wedding portrait that hung over the fireplace in their den.

“Hoooooly shit mom! You’re huge!!”

“Why thank you sweetie. It’s good of you to notice.”

“What-but how-??”

“Well..., I told you a small fib. I DID have a major project under way. And yes, the reality show WAS shot but I didn’t go down to South America to supervise. I was here the entire time.”

“What happened to you?”

“Well...that is a very long story. Walk with me.”

Angela and Stephanie walked out of the office area, Stephanie having to take three steps to her mother’s one just to barely keep up.

“This whole process started because of you.”

“Me???? What do I have to do with this?”

“You’re the only tangible thing I have left of your father. He was everything I ever dreamed of in a man. Tall, extremely handsome, muscular and vastly intelligent. When I had you I was overjoyed. But then I realized that you had been cursed with my barely above average genes. I wanted to find a way to change that so that you become the woman you were meant to be. So I hired someone to “acquire” a canister of an experimental growth compound that had been invented. But then it occurred to me that I had no way of knowing how safe it was. And after careful consideration, I decided to test it on myself.”

“What if it hadn’t worked?”

Nearly all the companies assets are/were being held in trust for you until your 21st birthday, so you would have been well taken care of for the rest of your life.”

“O...K...”

“But as you can see it did work as expected. In fact, it worked better than I could have ever dreamed! Here let me show you.”

Angela walked down to the weight area where two of the nurses had just finished a workout session.

“Brenda? How much weight is on the bar right now?

“About 375 lbs. Mrs. Dennet.”

“Would you mind increasing it for me?”

“Yes ma’am. How much do you want?”

“Double should be fine.”

“750 lbs.!! Mom you can’t be serious!! You’re going to bench press that much weight?”

“Who said anything about bench pressing it?”

Angela stood behind the bench, grabbed hold of the barbell and began BICEP-CURLING the weight to her chest. Stephanie watched in astonishment as her mother curled the bar 10, 20, 30, 50 times without barely, breaking a sweat. Around the 35th rep, Stephanie heard a riiiiiiiipping sound as the long sleeves of her blouse were forced to surrender to her mother’s thick forearms and massive biceps. After she was done, Angela let out a quick breath, re-racked the bar and flexed her swollen bicep for her daughter to touch.

“What you did just now was close to impossible mom.”

“Nah, not really. That weight was barely enough to give me a good pump. If it was 1500 lbs, THEN my girls could show you what they’re made of!!”

“So…you like...this??”

“Baby, I LOVE it!! Not only am I taller, but I am 200 times stronger than I was before! My eyesight is better, my hearing is better and even my sense of smell is more acute! And I also have the speed and reflexes of an Olympic athlete.”

“Wow!!”

“Wow indeed sweetie. Another pleasant side effect is my sex drive has increased exponentially. I was going through at least 5 guys a night just to get myself off properly.”

“You serious???”

Angela nodded, pointing at 2 of the doctors, 1 of the scientists, 1 of the chefs and 1 of the personal trainers.

“They couldn’t keep up with me!!” Angela laughed.

“You’re like some kind of super-woman mom!!”

“I know. And I want you to be the same. Scratch that. I want you to surpass me.”
113.title: Angela begins using the formula herself

1131.content:
"Ok mom, let's do it!!"

"There's my good girl! Now, you're not going to be alone. There will be some other girls here with you as well."

Two months later, Stephanie sat in the conference room of her mother's company. She watched as Kelly came in, followed by four teenage girls. A tall, athletic black girl, a pretty blonde with huge breasts, a slightly chubby brunette and lastly, a young girl who looked like she was in middle school. The girls all stared at the muscular, young woman in amazement.

"Alright ladies, make yourselves comfortable. Mrs. Dennet will be here momentarily to address you."

As Kelly left, the blonde girl next to Stephanie nudged her.

"Oh my god! What have they been feeding her? She's bigger than my dad!"

Stephanie grinned and thought, "Sweetie, you ain't seen nothin' yet."

Just then, a muted thudding sound was heard outside. All the girls, save for Stephanie dashed to the far side of the room as a huge, goliath of a woman ducked under the doorway to enter the room. She was wearing a pale gray business suit obviously tailored to her size but still unable to hide the huge muscles bulging underneath it. She was followed by the young musclewoman they had met earlier. The huge woman smiled at them.

"Good morning ladies. I know my presence can be a bit....overwhelming but let assure you, there is no one or nothing here that will harm you. So please, feel free to take your seats."

The gingerly walked back to the conference table and sat. When they had settled, the woman spoke again.

"First of all let me introduce myself. My name is Angela Dennet. The lady you met earlier was my assistant Kelly."

Kelly waved to the group.

"Now I want each of you to stand and introduce yourselves. The young lady to my immediate right by the way is my daughter Stephanie."

Stephanie stood up and just barely avoided laughing at the wide-eyed stares the girls were giving her and her massive mother. The blonde next to her then stood up.

"Melody Saunders, 17"

"Megan Watters, 18"

"Denise Brown, 19"

"Tabitha Brooks, 14"

"Now I'm sure you all are wondering why Tabitha was chosen. Before I answer that, I explain what it is you are volunteering for. You have been chosen to test an experimental muscle enhancement formula. As I’m sure you all can probably guess, Kelly and I have already used it and are quite pleased with the results. Right, Kelly?"

"Yes ma'am!! More than pleased!!"

Angela chuckled.

"Anyway, we decided to do a second round of testing to see the effects the drug would have on women who have not yet reached full maturity. So we chose girls of different ages and body types. You four older girls will receive a tremendous dosage of the formula triggering an exponential increase in your physical size and strength. Tabitha on the other hand will be our long-term study. She will receive much smaller amounts than you will but her’s will be over a period of time.”

“What? Why?”

“The purpose is to see what happens if a person is exposed to the formula over a period of years instead if months. If there are any problems or side effects that we need to be aware of.”

“So you’re using me as some sort of guinea pig?”

“In a manner of speaking yes. But the benefits greatly outweigh the risks. We will continue to monitor your progress even after the project is finished. By that time, you will most likely be the biggest female bodybuilder that ever walked this planet.”

“Awesome!!”

“There is one thing that we have discovered that we need to warn you about. The one small “side effect”. Use of this formula creates a significant increase in sexual arousal and fertility in women.”
“What does that mean?”

“It means that those among you who are sexually active need to be careful. If a guy SNEEZES on you, you’ll get pregnant.”

The four older girls laughed. Tabitha looked on in horror. Denise saw her look of fear and tried to calm her.

“She’s joking Tabitha. That’s not how it happens. At least not the last time…”

“Alright ladies, last chance to back out. Anyone not interested, feel free to get up and leave.”

The girls looked at one another, but none wanted to be the first to get up.

“Excellent. Kelly will be passing around the contracts for each of you to sign. We’ll give you a few minutes to read them over. We’ve highlighted all the spaces we need signature on.”

Twenty minutes later all the contracts were signed.

“Perfect. Now distribute their signing bonuses Kelly.”

The girls looked wide-eyed at the checks in front of them. Megan spoke up first.

“Ma’am? Are you sure this is right? These checks say $25,000.00”

“Yes. That’s right. You are subjecting your bodies to a ground-breaking experiment and you will be sequestered away for an extended period of time. We felt it was only fair that you be properly compensated. Fifty thousand dollars seemed like an appropriate figure. You will receive the other twenty-five at the end of the experimentation period ALONG with a 4 year scholarship to the university of your choosing.”

“Oh my god!!”

“Are you for real?”

“No way anyone is gonna believe this!!”

“So ladies, are you all satisfied now?”

“Yes ma’am!!” the girls cried in unison.

“Wonderful. Welcome to the Dennet Media family. Let’s get started.”

11311.content:
The girls were shuttled out to the facility aboard a bus with the windows completely blacked out. When they arrived, they were greeted by Kelly.

"Ok ladies. Last chance. If you're having second thoughts, you can back out. Keep in mind though, if you quit, now or any time before the project is done you will automatically LOSE your compensation package."

Nobody budged.

Kelly smiled and said, "Alright, let's go inside."

The place was just the same as Stephanie remembered it from a few months earlier. The only difference being that a small nursery/daycare area had been set up for the infants of the workers who were still there. The other girls stared bug-eyed at the numerous muscular men and women walking around. There were two women in the gym area bench-pressing an enormous amount of weight. Denise, who was an athlete herself, did a quick count of the plates and estimated it to be at least 450 lbs! And from what she can see they were preparing to up it to 475! Melody glanced over at the mess hall area and saw a server walk past, her biceps bulging as she balanced two platters stacked with three large turkeys on each hand. Two nurses then walked past and smiled at the girls. They both looked like they would better suited to working in porn movies than the medical field. The already short dresses they wore were further compounded by the fact that they could only barely get their zippers closed part way over their enormous breasts. Kelly gave them a few more minutes to take in the sights before she called them over to her once again.

“This is where you all will be spending the next couple of months girls. I can assure you, the time will fly by. Especially with all of you together. Now follow me over to the medical area. The first step of your journey will begin with a medical exam.”

She beckoned to one of the doctors and he walked over to greet them. He was at least 6 feet 5 inches tall with deep blue eyes and raven black hair. He had muscles that would make Superman green with envy.

“Good afternoon ladies. My name is Dr. Steve Tompkins. I assume that you will be under my care and supervision for the next few months?”

“Yes Dr. Tompkins. They’re all yours. I’m sure you and your staff will take very good care of them.”

“Indeed we will.”

“Alright girls. I’ll see you all soon.”

Kelly then exited as Dr Tompkins ushered them into the medical area.

“Let’s begin. Nurse Tiffany and Nurse Bethany will begin your check-ups.”

The twin nurses walked over carrying trays of medical tools. They looked like supermodels except that their uniforms were filled to near bursting with huge muscles.

“Yes, Dr. Tompkins.” The nurses said in unison.

The girls were surprised that two such powerfully muscled women could as gentle as they were but graceful with it as well. They moved like ballet dancers. Megan asked them about it while she was being examined.

The two women looked at each other, giggled and said, “Practice.”

After the nurses were done, Dr. Tompkins addressed them again.

“We’re all done? Good! Now, based on the information the nurses gathered, we’re going to tailor your workout programs to each of your individual needs. Denise, since you’re already athletic we will dramatically increase your strength, speed and agility. Your synaptic responses will be tweaked as well so your reflexive reaction will be phenomenal. You do track and play basketball, correct?”

“Yes sir. So you all are gonna help me improve my game?”

“Actually, it would not be advisable for you to play basketball. In the women’s division anyway. Or the men’s come to think of it. When you go to college, my recommendation is that you try out for the football or baseball teams. Maybe even wrestling.”

“So I’m gonna like a dude???”

“No!! We’d never do that to you!! You will completely retain your femininity. And then some. But due to the tremendous increase in your size, strength and speed it would be inadvisable for you to continue participating in women’s sports. In fact, you may even be a little too much for some MEN’S sports.”

“Oooohhhh!!! I LIKE that!!”

“Thought you would. Melody. You’re a cheerleader, correct?”

“Yes sir. Why?”

“Your changes will be tailored around your cheerleading abilities. Exponential increases in your flexibility, agility and of course strength.”

Wow! Cool!”

“There IS one thing though. We’ll need to remove your breast implants.”

“What? No!! Why?”

“Simply put, by the end of the experiment, we estimate that your breasts will probably be four to five cup sizes larger than they are now. And much firmer and more perky since they will be sitting atop your pectoral muscles. Those implants will be completely useless to you.”

“Oh my god!! When do we begin?!”

Dr. Tompkins laughed.

“Megan. You’re a special case. We’re-“

“Gonna put me on diet to make me lose weight. “Because it’s not healthy for a girl as PRETTY as you to have that much weight on her.” Heard it all before doc.”

“What? You think we brought you here to starve you? Oh my dear no! We WANT you to eat! As much as you like!!”

“This is some sort of trick right?”

“Absolutely not! You can eat as much as you want. All we’re doing is changing what you eat. Less bad, more good. And we’re not trying to keep you from eating junk food. In fact, next week Saturday is ice cream day for the entire facility. All we are doing is helping you to enjoy paying the consequences.”

“So what about my weight problem?”

“Who said you had a weight problem? Before I was so RUDELY interrupted,” Dr. Tompkins said, winking at her, “I was going to say we detected some early symptoms of high blood pressure and diabetes. We’re gonna shut them down permanently. And besides, you’re probably going to leave here heavier than you were when you entered. That excess fat on your body will be gone in a flash as soon as you start your workout regimen. You may even forget that you were a plus sized girl.”

We’ll see doc. We’ll see.”

“What about me Dr. Tompkins?”

“Ah yes. The marathon runner.”

“Marathon runner?”

“Yes. Like Mrs. Dennet explained to you, the other girls will be receiving high doses of the growth formula. You on the other hand will be getting lower dosages but more of them over a period of time. Namely the next 5 years.”

“Mrs. Dennet says that by the time it’s over I’ll be the biggest, strongest female bodybuilder there ever was. Is that true?”

“I don’t see why not. By the time you re-enter school when the project is done we estimate you will be eight times stronger than any average girl your age and at least three times stronger than any boy.”

“Wooooow…..”

“So what about Stephanie?”

“Stephanie’s program was specifically designed especially for her. I’m not at liberty to speak about it.”

“O…K…”
“Alright, now that you all are up to speed it’s time to introduce you all to the little marvel that will change your lives forever. Bethany. If you please.”

“Yes Dr. Tompkins.”

Bethany went over to the cabinet and returned with a case. She opened to reveal four glass hypodermic needles with a light blue liquid inside.

“Line up girls. Roll up your sleeves. Tabitha will be last of course. Stephanie. Go see Dr. Whymms. He’ll take care of your shots.”

“Shots?”

“Yes.”

Each girl yelped as they were stuck with the hypos of formula. Tabitha, who was afraid of needles, almost cried. Behind a curtain, in the laboratory area, Stephanie was being hooked to an intra-venous drip connected to a bag containing a dark purple liquid.

113111.content:
Saturday morning, 10:30 am.

“38...39....40! at three hundred and fifty pounds. Megan just earned her double scoop. Care to try for the triple?”

Megan wiped the sweat from her face and giggled.

“No thanks Dr. T. I know my limits!”

“You go SB! Now move outta the way. It's my turn!” Denise said, playfully elbowing her aside.

“SB???”

“Yeah doc. That's her new nickname.”

“Which means?”

“Skinny Bitch.”

“Doc. I don't mind being called a skinny bitch. In fact, I LOVE it! It's much better than my old nickname.”

“Let me guess. “Fat Bitch”?”

“Exactly.”

“I'll never understand you girls...”

“Don't try!!”

As Denise loaded up the bench-press bar with 425 lbs., her current personal best, Megan walked over to one of the full length mirrors on one side of the workout area. In the past she loathed them. Now, it seemed like she was drawn to them, like a moth to a flame. The doctor wasn't lying when he said, she'd see a stunning metamorphosis in herself. They didn't stop her from eating just like they promised, it was just that the tables were filled every day with fresh fruit and vegetables and lots and lots of protein. At first she had a hard time adjusting to the diet, her body craving the junk food it was used to. But as soon as she started their daily workouts, she began devouring everything put in front of her. And much to her shock, no one breathed a word when she went back for seconds. Or thirds. Or fourths!! She was even more shocked, when she saw the numbers on the scale DROPPING when she went for their bi-weekly physicals. After three weeks, after her morning shower she dropped her towel on the ground and was staring at the sculpted, muscular body of a serious fitness competitor. It was on that day that Denise gave her the nickname she loved so much.

Denise took a deep breath and pushed the heavy barbell over her head, exhaling on the way up. Then she lowered the bar once again for the 50th time, feeling as the hard steel bar barely brushed the equally hard nipples of her sports bra covered breasts. Denise had been a top female athlete at her school and was no stranger to the inside of a gym. She was almost always training for basketball season or track or the occasional softball or flag football game. Her personal best in the gym was about 250 lbs. NOW she was using that as her warm-up weight!! She was the second largest and strongest of the girls. Hot on the heels of Mrs. Dennet's daughter Stephanie, who was either studying or sleeping right then, she wasn't sure which. And just like Dr. Tompkins had said, even with her near superhuman strength, speed and reflexes she had not lost her feminine attributes, as evidenced by the FFF-cup breasts that were slowly bursting the seams of her current top. The heavy weight she was lifting did nothing to remedy the problem as it only caused them to grow bigger with every pump. It wasn't as if her or any of the other girls walking around topless would cause a stir inside the hangar, but for the sake of decency, they kept it to a minimum. Denise's bowling ball-sized and shaped ass guaranteed that only them and her broad shoulders were touching the surface of the bench.

Melody and Tabitha were over in the corner, having a race of sorts on the treadmills. They would try to one-up one another by increasing the speed of their treadmills every few minutes. They had been running for the past hour and a half at the treadmills' nearly full speed and neither of them had shown even the slightest signs of fatigue. Although, the machines' motors were on the verge of overheating. Melody's sports bra was made of much stonger and thicker material than everyone else's primarily to contain the enormous breasts sitting on her chest. But that still didn't stop them from bouncing along to her stride. Melody was slightly apprehensive about the implant removal surgery when they first began, despite her original enthusiasm. And she did feel a bit small and insignificant when they were done. But all that changed after she began her individualized program. In the first two weeks, her breasts had grown to almost their pre-removal size. After that it was like they had been hooked up to a helium tank. She would almost jump for joy on their chest workout days because her breasts would be 3-5 inches bigger after each one and she would go up a cup size every week and a half. Thankfully, after 10 weeks her growth finally began to slow down and stop at her current 88 HH cup. The tailors who made the clothing for the entire facility had the stroke of genius to begin incorporating kevlar weave into the bras and workout gear of the three bigger girls. This allowed the clothes to survive some of the wear and tear put on them by the girls' sudden growth spurts.

Stephanie was currently asleep despite the bustling and clanking that echoed through the hangar that morning. She never got up before noon, maybe after one o'clock to join the girls for lunch and their afternoon and evening workout sessions. And after everyone else went to bed, she would be up for the rest of the night, having a private workout session or staring and tapping away on her computer. No one knew what she was up to but it seemed to be very important. She was also administering her own shots as she had dismissed the science team months earlier. The only indication that she was still actively maintaining her routine was during their evening weigh-ins and measurements, she would always be 2-5 inches bigger than Denise in every aspect.

The months soon flew by and the day had finally come to show Angela the fruits of their labors.

1131111.content:
Angela was sitting at her desk, trying her hardest to read through the monthly reports she had to review. Even with her enhanced reading and memory retention abilities, it was still a tedious task. She was halfway through the first report when her phone rang.

“Hello?”

“Mrs. Dennet?”

“Yes, Anthony, how are you?”

“Not so good Mrs. Dennet. Someone has been buying lots and lots of Dennet media stock. If they acquire any more, THEY will be the majority shareholder in your company.”

“WHAT??” Angela had to restrain herself before she crushed the receiver in her hand.

“Yes ma'am. They're shares are close to rivaling your own.”

“Well, I want you to find out who this person or people are Anthony. That is your number one priority!”

“Yes ma'am!!”

Twenty minutes later, her phone rang again.

“Yes, what is it?”

“I discovered the name of the company who has been buying up your stock ma'am. They're called the UberFrau Group. They're a fairly new company but they seem to have lots of capital and have been purchasing a number of smaller companies as well.”

“I see. And where are they located?”

“That's the funny part ma'am. They don't seem to be located anywhere! I had research try tracking the source of their transactions and every time their efforts were blocked. They seem to be using a number of unmarked accounts and dummy corporations to do their business as well as mask their whereabouts. It's nearly impossible to discover who they are.”

“Keep trying. I can't have my husband's company falling into the hands of strangers!”

“Yes ma'am!”

Angela leaned back in her chair. Even in her worry she giggled to herself as she heard the SCREEEEECH!!! of the chair's springs trying hold up her powerfully muscled bulk. She HAD to find out who this UberFrau Group was! Dennet Media was all that she had left to leave to Stephanie, along with some almost priceless jewelry her grandmother had left for her and a few small investments. She had faith in her financial services department but she knew they had a major dilemma on their hands. While she was pondering her next move, her cell phone rang.

“Hi sweetie!” she said, trying to mask the concern in her voice.

“Hey mom. Today's D-day!”

“Oh my gosh!! I almost forgot! It's been crazy around here recently.”

For good measure, however, it also now included hydraulic lifts and a souped up engine, was painted pink with an UberFrau logo, and had spinning rims. While they admitted that not all of these were necessary, they figured that it was good publicity. They had plenty of it since they had to drive across town to the airstrip.
All of them had a good view of the plane's exterior when pulling up. Like the limo, it was painted pink with a logo on it and its nose. The limo pulled up right to the staircase, at which time a statuesque Tabitha walked down. When she got down, she gently opened the door.
"It's ready," she said. On this cue, everyone piled out of the limo and up the stairs into the section between what used to be first class and coach, noticing the increased clearance of the doorway.
Once they got in, they were amazed at what was done. Like the door, the ceiling also had increased headroom. The former coach section was converted into a small gym with many of the essentials plus a smoothie and snack bar. 1133.content:
Stephanie suddenly took a deep breath and held it. She was suddenly filled with excitement and desire. Having her mom’s size and strength was undeniably exciting, and she demonstration she had just astounded her. To be that powerful!
She quickly frowned, however, and became thoughtful. Seeing this her mom immediately asked, “What’s the problem darling? Don’t you want this?” As she looked down from her nearly two foot height advantage she seemed genuinely concerned, but puzzled. To make her point she flexed her enormous right bicep and smiled.
Stephanie looked up in disbelief, and replied “Mom being like you would be incredible and amazing, no doubt. I just wonder what Jason would think.” There, she had said it.
“Jason?” Her mom asked, with a hard tone.
Stephanie nodded. “Yes mom, he’s my boyfriend. We started dating a few months ago.” Her mother took one giant step over to her and looked at her somewhat crossly.
“Stephanie, you know you’re not supposed to date just yet.”
Her daughter looked down at the floor, and then craned her neck to look up at her mom, with a pained expression in her eyes. “I know mom, but I really like him, and he’s good to me. Please don’t make me break up with him.”
Angela regarded her daughter for a moment, then said calmly “Tell you what, since I need a break from here for a while, and we need to catch up on a lot of things, why don’t we do this. How about you and me jump on the jet for a week in Mexico. You can tell me about Jason, and then I can let you know what its like to be an all powerful amazon. Deal?”
Stephanie nodded, and smiled “Sounds great, mom.”
Her mom smiled back, and said simply “Ok, let’s go.”

A WEEK LATER

Stephanie looked out the window of the Gulfstream jet, and smiled. She and her mom were on her way back to their “secret” facility to check up on things and maybe start the growth process for herself.
As she gazed down at the ground so far below she thought back to the unforgettable week she had just enjoyed in Cancun. After her meeting with her mom where she had broke the news about Jason they had boarded her mom’s private jet a few hours later.
The first thing Stephanie noticed was that her mom only had one medium sized suitcase. This was strange because she never traveled light in her life. When they arrived in Cancun a few hours later she soon discovered why. Her mother had only brought a few shorts, a couple of blouses, her makeup, and a large selection of tiny bikinis.
Over the next week Stephanie saw her mom Angela in entirely new way. Gone was the overly worrying petite mom who was constantly hovering over her as she grew up. Instead Angela was now an empowered, confident woman who was always at the center of attention. Even without her enormous size and strength her entire personality had changed. When she saw something she wanted, or needed something moved out of her way she did it herself, no questions asked.
Of course, Stephanie thought as the plane was approaching the runway, her mom’s new body was a big part of that. From the moment she stepped off the plane she was turning heads, left, right and upwards. No one at the resort had ever seen such a woman, with a gloriously muscular body. On the beach men crowded just to get a glimpse of her, and wherever she went all eyes were on her.
Now Stephanie just needed to decide her own future.

Andrew Barrett stared out the window of his 30th floor office suite. He was waiting for a phone call from the man he hired to steal the muscle growth formula from Parker-Gibson. Yes, it was unscrupulous but what they had, he wanted. This new discovery of theirs had the potential to put him out of business. He got into the sports supplement business on a dare from one of his colleagues. His small investment ended up making him a multi-millionaire. He also decided that the best way to market his products was to use them himself, so he spent the first 2 years transforming his 6 foot, 6 inch 175 lb frame into that of a 385 lb. muscle-god. When the stores and investors saw what it did for him they were almost throwing money at him. And the products did not disappoint. The people in the athletic community were quickly breaking the own personal and sometimes world record. And the members of the bodybuilding community were making enormous gains in strength and muscle-mass. But, despite all his wealth and fame, Andrew was still not happy. Sure, he had his pick of beautiful women but there was still a problem. Apparently one of the supplements he was taking also triggered a tremendous increase in penile length and girth. This turned out to be both a blessing and a curse. He could not find a woman who could satisfy him sexually. What he needed was a woman with sufficient, strength and stamina to get the job done right. After hearing about the muscle growth formula at a cocktail party he had found the answer he was looking for. He glanced around the room and saw Angela Dennet, the wife of media mogul Paul Dennet listening a bit intently as well. He knew he couldn’t waste any time. About two minutes later, his cell phone rang.

“You got the formula? Excellent. I’m in the office. Drop by for the rest of your money.”

Fifteen minutes later the thief walked in the door.

“You certainly are an efficient person aren’t you?”

“How did you see me?”

“Nothing goes on in and around this building without my knowledge.”

“Ok. Well here’s the stuff like you asked for.”

Andrew walked over and examined the canister. It was what he was waiting for! He pushed a black leather attaché case over to the man.

“I believe it’s all there. Plus an extra 50 thousand for getting the job done so quickly.”

“Thank you Mr. Barrett”

“Yeah, but I don’t think you’d be interested in it.”

“I’ll be the judge of that. Hand it over.”

“Sure. For another half mil...”

“No way! I’ll offer you 350 thousand and not a penny more!!”

The thief sighed and nodded in agreement. Andrew went to his wall safe and got out the money. He handed the man the money and at the same time received the second canister. The thief got up, stuffed the money in the briefcase and headed for the door. As he was about to leave he turned back and pretended to lift his imaginary cap to Andrew.

“Pleasure doing business with you sir.”

Andrew stared at the canisters in his possession. He had them!! He could finally fulfill his dream. He locked the canisters in the safe and headed for the door. He’d turn the cans over to his head of development first thing in the morning.

info.brief_description: A professional thief steals a female growth formula from a lab
info.description:
The Female Muscle Growth genre seems to have developed a lull on writing.com lately, so I thought I'd try to spark some writing with a new story. Here's the basic plot:

This story begins with a hired professional thief has broken into a drug company to steal a secret formula. After managing to steal the formula undetected he returns to his employer for his compensation.

Introductory characters:

Angela: A rich mother who wants the growth formula for her 16 year old daughter Stephanie.

Stephanie: The 16 year old daughter of Angela, Stephanie is an only child who lives with her extremely wealthy and widowed mother in a huge mansion and is home schooled. 5'2", beautiful but physically weak and unathletic, she is unaware of the enormous (real and figurative) plans her mother has for her.

Andrew: A wealthy businessman who loves tall, muscular women. Andrew wants the formula to secretly give to his female employees and grow them into muscular amazons.

Other purchasers of the formula can be Reader's Choice.


Basic rules:
*The formula only makes WOMEN grow taller and more muscular. On men it either makes them shrink smaller or has no effect whatsoever.

*The formula does make women's muscles grow, but the effects are greatly magnified with regular workouts.

**I would prefer that this be a slow growth formula story. You can have fun with how fast or slow, ie 1-2 inches per hour, 1 inch per week, etc. However, if you insist you can make the formula more fast acting, perhaps in combination with other ingredients.

I would prefer if no main characters would die. Other things I would prefer:

-No male gay stuff

- No cartoon or comic book characters in this story.

-No negative stereotypes pertaining to female muscle.
